title: Bayerisch Staatsoper, Siegfried, Richard Wagner
description: Top half of poster is gradient from left to right, yellow to red. Bottom half of poster is black. In center, a yellow ring. Text at right in white down side reads: "Bayerische Staatsoper/ Siegfried/ Richard Wagner " with additional date and time information below.
